title: The World's Most Complex Code —  The Voynich Manuscript (Part 2)

media:group.media:title: The World's Most Complex Code —  The Voynich Manuscript (Part 2)
media:group.media:description:
The Voynich Manuscript still remains one of the greatest cryptographic mysteries in history, even 600 years after its original creation. In this video, the continuation of my previous video on the manuscript, I talk about the illustrations of the manuscript and go over some of the most common theories about its conception.

Part 1: https://youtu.be/knnQ3LJIQdA
